Juno Lighting WF6 SWW5 90CRI CP6 MW M2 LED 6 Inch Switchable Wafer Downlight Fixture (6-Pack)

  • 5 switchable color temperatures to choose with a switch ranging from warm (2700K) to daylight (5000K) allowing customization for endless applications. 2700K, 3,000K, 3500K, 4000K, 5000K

entry.title: Lithonia Lighting WF4 ADJ LED 30K40K50K 90CRI MW M6 Wafer Adjustable Gimbal with Switchable Color Temperature, 4-Inch, Matte White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lithonia Lighting
Type: LED Recessed Retrofit Kits
Price: 28.50

Lithonia Lighting WF4 ADJ LED 30K40K50K 90CRI MW M6 Wafer Adjustable Gimbal with Switchable Color Temperature, 4-Inch, Matte White

 

The 4-inch Wafer™ Gimbal fixture has a 20° tilt on 180° rotation. These low maintenance LED fixtures are 80% more efficient than incandescent recessed fixtures, designed to reduce lighting costs without compromising lighting levels. Ideal for sloped ceilings, wall washing, highlight artwork, task or general lighting. The innovative Switchable White feature incorporates a switch on each fixture for simple color temperature adjustment. Too warm or too cool? Simply toggle the integrated switch to your desired setting (3000K factory default) and you are done! Whatever your application, luminaires with Switchable White are sure to give you the feel and flexibility that you need.

SPEC:

 

  • 36,000 Hour L70 Life Rating
  • 10 Watt
  • 120 Volt
  • Wet Location Rated
  • 5 Year Warranty
  • NOTE: Dimmable with approved dimmers only
  • Switchable White Light Technology
  • 680 lumens @ 3000K
  • 750 lumens @ 4000K
  • 730 lumens @ 5000K
  • Aperture: 3.5" Ceiling opening: 4.1" Overlap trim: 5.3" Height: 1.4"

    •

entry.title: Lithonia Lighting WF8643 Universal New Construction Pan for 3 in - 8 in Wafers LED Downlight
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lithonia Lighting
Type: LED Wafer
Price: 9.50

Lithonia Lighting WF8643 Universal New Construction Pan for 3 in - 8 in Wafer LED Downlight

 

Description

The Lithonia Wafer WF8643 PAN U is a universal new construction plate for the 4, 6, and 8 inch LED ultra-thin downlights. The new construction plate can be installed in either wood joist or suspended T-Grid ceilings. The Lithonia Wafers series are ideal downlight solution for shallow ceilings in residential and commercial applications.

entry.title: LED 6 Inch Wafer Indoor/Outdoor Housing-Free Recessed Downlight in White, 4000K
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lithonia Lighting
Type: LED Wafer
Price: 25.50

The 6 inch Wafer LED is an ultra-thin recessed downlight with a narrow remote driver box for applications with shallow ceiling plenum. The Wafer LED is a comprehensive recessed downlight, pot light housing are not necessary. The Wafer LED allows quick and simple installations and can be installed from below in application with as little as 2 inch plenum clearance.

 

Wattage: 13 Watt
Incandescent Equal: 90 Watt
Lumens: 1020
Voltage: 120
Outside Diameter: 6.7 in.
Inside Diameter: 4.9 in.
Height: 1.1 in.
Warranty: 5 Years
